title: Interpretation of a dream about receiving a clean, slaughtered chicken in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about receiving a slaughtered and cleaned chicken in a dream in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a slaughtered and cleaned chicken in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been slaughtered and cleaned chicken, it can indicate that his condition will change for the better, thanks to God. In the event that My personal opinion is that he received a very clean chicken, so this may indicate good changes in his life in those days. It is possible that the vision of receiving a slaughtered, clean chicken in a dream indicates a new experience that the dreamer will enter during this period. In the case of my personal opinion, he received a slaughtered chicken Cleaning the dream may indicate the ability of the dreamer to achieve the goals and aspirations of that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received a lot of banknotes may indicate happiness and joy in life. A dream about receiving banknotes may indicate In a dream, it indicates the marital happiness that the dreamer was enjoying in his life at that time. Seeing paper money in a dream may indicate the diligence of the visionary in achieving his goals and ambitions. If a married woman sees that she obtained banknotes in a dream, and there were a lot of them, then she may This indicates the happiness that she was enjoying in her life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about taking medicine from someone in a dream: It is possible that the vision of taking medicine indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances, thanks to God. Anyone who dreams that he took medicine from someone can It indicates the strength of his relationship with him and his strong love. Seeing someone taking medicine in a dream may indicate good changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this time. If the girl sees that she is taking medicine from someone, this may indicate the happiness that will come in her life in the future. That time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a lock of hair in a dream: Seeing a lock of hair in a dream may indicate some difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life and that he will overcome. Anyone who sees in a dream that he got a lock of hair can indicate positive changes that will occur. In the dreamer's life during these days. If one sees that he has taken a lock of hair from another person, this may indicate that he has achieved goals and ambitions, thanks to God. Whoever dreams that someone has taken a lock of his hair may indicate a great loss that the person with vision may suffer from. At that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a gold ring from a dead person in a dream. If one sees that he took a gold ring from the dead, this may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will receive in those days. In the event that one believes that he received a ring Of gold from the dead, this may indicate that he was in good health and free from the diseases that he was suffering from, thanks to God. If you see a golden ring in a dream, this may indicate a change in circumstances for the better and getting rid of financial crises. title: Interpretation of dreams about milk coming out of the right breast of a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a man in a dream indicates his excellence in his work and his immediate promotion, and seeing a dream of an unemployed young man starting a new job at this time, and interpretations of dreams are praiseworthy. Through our website shown in the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of a dream about milk coming out of the breast in a way that constitutes a factor. For all social situations, follow us. The interpretation of seeing milk coming out of the breast in a dream for a single girl is if the single girl presses her breast and takes from it in the dream. It indicates the great achievements that the dreamer will achieve in her life, and God knows best. Or seeing the unmarried woman looking at the milk coming out of the breast The right hand in a dream and she feels happy. Here it indicates the kindness and sustenance that this single girl will experience in her life. And seeing that the breast comes out with milk, and being breastfed with it in a dream. Mention the good things that she will see in her life, the good things that will come, and the great happiness, God willing. I also saw that an unmarried woman wanted her breasts to come out but she couldn't. It shows the things she is trying to achieve at this time in her life. An unmarried woman who sees that her fiancé is pressing on her breasts and milk comes out. It shows that things will be easy between them and that he will get rid of some problems. That she lives with him. See also: Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a single woman. Interpretation of seeing milk coming out of the breast in a dream for a married woman. And seeing that the married woman was looking in a dream at the milk coming out of the right breast. It shows that he will get rid of the problems and tensions that he is experiencing during this time. And also to see A baby is breastfeeding and milk comes out of the right breast in a dream. It appears that she will give birth to a beautiful baby girl in her life during this time, God willing. Either a married woman says that she presses on her chest to extract a lot of milk from it in a dream. It may indicate the great achievements that this married woman will achieve If a married woman sees in her dream that she was looking at her breast and a lot of milk came out without her touching it. It indicates abundance of sustenance and many good things that she will receive. And if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is looking at the milk coming out of her breast. It indicates To the goodness that he will attain in his life, God willing. Interpretation of seeing milk coming out of the breast in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman looking at her breast, and a lot of milk was coming out of it in a dream. It announces the abundant goodness that is coming to her at this time, God willing. What if she saw a divorced woman in her life He was looking at her breasts, and he was pumping milk in front of her ex-husband. Perhaps Fidel will return to him again, and God knows best. She saw a divorced woman breastfeeding her child after milk flowed from her right breast in a dream. It shows that he will get rid of all the problems he is going through now. A divorced woman. She squeezes her breasts and a lot of milk comes out in the dream. It indicates the goodness that she will find after some fatigue and misery in her life. Like a divorced woman who sees milk coming out of the breast noticeably. It announces that at this time he will get rid of all the problems of life. Read also:

title: Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing nuts in a dream has many meanings. Seeing walnuts can be a sign of good or an omen of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream depending on the dreamer’s condition and circumstances and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Seeing nuts in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Seeing nuts in a dream indicates that the dreamer will enjoy many blessings and goodness in his life. Seeing nuts In a dream, it indicates that the fortuneteller is a generous person and does everything with perfection and precision. Seeing nuts in a dream shows that the coming period of the dreamer’s life will be full of prosperity and happiness. Seeing in a dream eating rotten nuts indicates many worries and anxieties in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation Seeing Qatayef in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing nuts in a single woman’s dream? Seeing only nuts without peeling them in the dream announces that she will achieve all her goals, ambitions, and scientific and practical life. Seeing single people eating nuts in a dream shows that she will marry someone soon and enjoy all the qualities she wants. Seeing a single woman eating Nuts with her lover in a dream showed that he will propose to her in the near future. Seeing unmarried people shelling nuts in a dream says that he will hear good news soon. Seeing walnuts in a dream spread in a strange place shows that she will face a problem because of someone close to her. See also: Interpretation of seeing Yemish Ramadan in Dream: What is the interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates that she will be pregnant soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman taking nuts from her husband in a dream says that he is living a married life full of happiness, satisfaction and comfort. Seeing a married woman eating nuts in a dream indicates He will obtain a lot of money through legitimate means, such as inheritance. Seeing a married woman planting walnuts in a dream indicates her great efforts to take care of her husband and children. What is the interpretation of seeing walnuts in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing walnuts for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that God will bless her with the type of fetus she wants, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman eating nuts in a dream shows that she will undergo an easy and affordable birth. See also: Interpretation of seeing shrimp in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream for a man? Seeing a man playing with nuts in a dream indicates that he has obtained prohibited money. Seeing a single man eating nuts in a dream shows that he will get married. A good, kind, good girl. Seeing a man eating walnut shells in a dream indicates that many of the dreamer’s words about people are lies and lies. Interpretation of seeing cashews in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman eating cashews in a dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding to the young man who suits her and the one she loves. Seeing single cashews Scattered on the ground in a

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken: See raw and cooked chicken

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansThe dream of eating chicken in a dream and seeing chicken, raw or cooked, is one of the visions that many people seek and in many other ways.Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreamsEating chicken in a dreamIt indicates a strong woman who is able to take charge.Seeing an unmarried chick in The dream is evidence of a bachelor’s marriage. Seeing chicks in a dream may indicate the benefit and abundance that the dreamer will receive soon. Eating chicken meat in a dream indicates blessing, strength, and a happy life that the dreamer will live. Dreaming of eating a chicken leg in a dream is a sign of a fair wife that he will receive. According to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about chicks by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing chicks in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a large number of chicks in the house is evidence of the high status that the dreamer will obtain. Chicken wings in a dream indicate the achievement of the goals and desires that the dreamer was trying to achieve. It was achieved some time ago. Eating chicks indicates the end of worries and problems. Buying chicks in a dream that are white and plump indicates happiness and a lot of money. Peeling chicks in a dream is a sign of a serious illness for a woman. Seeing chicks laying eggs indicates that a woman seeks Raising her children to a healthy upbringing, to be fair and just with their father. Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken for a single woman: A dream about a girl raw chicken is evidence that a marriage loser will fall in love with the girl. A dream about cooked chicken indicates a happy marriage with a prominent man. Eating the heads of chicks is an indication of losses that The girl will suffer in her life. If the girl sees that she ate a man’s chickens, this indicates that she has committed sins and disobedience. Chicks in general in a dream soon are evidence of marriage and will be with a very suitable man. Interpretation of a dream about eating chicken for a married woman. Eating raw chicks in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it is a sign of marital disputes and problems that women face. A dream about slaughtering chicks indicates betrayal. The husband, but he will quickly seduce this woman and keep her husband. Uncooked chicken in a dream is a sign of conflict and tension, and chicken in general is a sign of happiness and a lot of food. Chicks indicate... The dream indicates pregnancy and pregnancy in the near future. Interpretation of seeing chicks for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees black chicks in a dream, this indicates the birth of a boy. Seeing white chicks in a dream is evidence of the birth of a girl. Seeing cooked chicks in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of happiness and pleasure. Which she will have after giving birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicks for a man: If one sees in a dream that he is slaughtering chickens, this indicates his separation from his wife. Grilled chicken indicates a refuge that distracts the dreamer from the basic things in his life, and these are unpleasant visions. Slaughtering chickens dreamIn general, this indicates To the deception and scheming that the dreamer falls into. Eating chicken breasts in a dream is a sign of and

title: Interpretation of eating lupine in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lupine in a dream through the website vision roy2a.com. Lupine is one of the plants of the legume family and has a distinctive taste that is loved by many. It is used as a type of gourmet entertainment and has multiple benefits because it contains proteins and oils. It is also used in cosmetic uses. When seeing lupine in a dream, the dreamer wonders about the meaning and whether Whether it is good or bad for him, we will show you the most important things that the great dream interpreters have come up with, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. The topic, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a lupine in a dream. Seeing a lupine soaked in water is a sign of goodness and blessings, and the sick person is a sign of recovery. A dried lupine in a dream is a sign of fatigue and stress. Lupine in a dream is a sign of the fulfillment of desires. Distributing flashes in a dream is a sign of a happy event and good news. Seeing a green lupine in In a dream, it indicates the effort made to earn a living. Yellow lupine in a dream indicates changes in the life of the dreamer for the better. Seeing a lupine in a dream indicates the money that the dreamer collects from his toil and toil. Eating lupine in a patient’s sleep is an indication of his imminent recovery. Using a lupine as a mask in a dream on the occasion of a breakdown Worries and fear. Bitter lupine in a dream. An unpleasant vision portends anxiety and unpleasant news. Seeing lupine in a dream means bachelor’s degree in achieving the goals and ambitions that he has been striving for for some time. Interpretation of seeing lupine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing green lupine in a dream is a sign of fatigue. And effort in life and that he will be rewarded for his work with profit and money. Seeing boiled lupine in a dream indicates a wide source of livelihood that you will obtain. Soaking lupine in a dream indicates freedom from worries, sorrows and diseases. Eating crushed lupine in a dream is a sign of problems and troubles in the life of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a vision Lupine in a dream for a single woman. Eating dried lupine in a dream for a single woman is an indication of care, miserliness, and exposure to deprivation. Seeing boiled or boiled lupine in a person’s dream is evidence that one’s livelihood and money will soon befall. Seeing ground lupine for beauty in one’s dream indicates that she will get rid of her sorrows and worries and worries about her thinking. Buying a yellow lupine in one dream indicates excellence and success in her life and managing her life well. Interpretation of seeing a lupine in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a lupine in a married woman’s dream is a sign of goodness and livelihood for her and her home. Seeing a ground lupine being used in cosmetics indicates to a married woman that there are changes in her life. For the better. Distributing a thermos in a dream to a married woman is good news of the arrival of a happy event in her life. Eating a thermos in a married woman’s dream. Good taste is good news for her upcoming pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a thermos in a dream for a pregnant woman. Distributing a thermos in a dream for a pregnant woman. Determining the date of her next birth will be easy and affordable. Vision Eating fresh lupine with good taste for pregnant women indicates that she has a daughter.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black pants in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of black pants in a dreamInterpretation of seeing black pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin, expresses the loss of the priest’s worries and the many disasters he is going through that will soon be removed. Seeing black pants in a dream means a lot of sorrows and worries, and it is one of the dreams that is completely unpredictable and can indicate On the occurrence of misfortunes, and God knows best. Black pants in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees black pants in her dream, this indicates the death of her fears and the disputes that occur, as well as happiness. This vision may also indicate her close marriage to a righteous man who is trying to marry her and propose to her. Which suits her well. Seeing black pants in a dream may indicate permanent excellence in her academic and professional life and the brilliant success that she will achieve. Also, seeing black pants in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate that she has a lot to live for, a lot of money and a good and prestigious job. And God knows best. Black pants in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams in her sleep of seeing her husband’s black pants, this indicates many misfortunes that she will suffer in the coming period as well as the end of her worries. Also, seeing black pants in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the woman’s desire. And her husband entering a new job and the abundance of happiness that she will find in her life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing black pants in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing black pants, this means that the dreamer’s fears will disappear and the woman will enter a new job. Also, seeing black pants in a dream may indicate The good treatment of a pregnant woman and her husband indicates the ease of her upcoming birth. Interpretation of seeing black pants in a dream for a man: Seeing a man wearing black pants in his dream, this vision indicates the collapse of his problems and the lack of good morals with his relatives. Also, seeing black pants in a married man’s dream may indicate his close marriage. From a good girl and the happiness that he will encounter. Also, seeing black pants in a dream may indicate the collapse of marital disputes in the life of a married man and the provision of good offspring. When a man sees black pants in his dream, this indicates the many misfortunes that he will go through in his life and that he will enter a job. New.If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the shape of a tooth in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the appearance of a molar in a dream. The importance of teeth in general and molars in particular lies in their being part of a person’s smile and appearance. You can imagine what the appearance looks like when you laugh without teeth. Other than that, the organic function is also important because it plays a role in cutting food and facilitating its digestion. It should be noted that the teeth that appear in young children are considered non-permanent structures, as they fall out, fall out, and fall out. Teeth always appear. Instead, we will report in this article. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a molar in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the appearance of a molar in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A person can see in his dream a molar or tooth in any form, and this is a sign according to the science of interpretation of visions and dreams, and from what was mentioned in the interpretation The dream of a molar appearing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is as follows: A molar in a dream indicates the longevity of the dreamer according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. While the falling of molars in the lower sphere indicates that the fortuneteller will fall into many problems and worries. If someone sees that he feels... With pain in one of his molars, this is because someone is really hurting him. While the falling of the upper teeth is considered an undesirable vision, as it symbolizes the death or illness of someone close to him. If someone sees his teeth falling out in his hand, this indicates that he will collect a lot of money in the period Coming. If a man sees that he smells between the teeth in a dream, this indicates the outbreak of strife and a lot of discussion in the dreamer’s life. If the molars shake in the dream, this is a sign of the presence of obstacles and problems in the dreamer’s life. While the presence of a hole in the molar indicates the negativity that characterizes the fortuneteller. As well as his inability to make an important decision in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about feces for a pregnant woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing a tooth falling out in a dream? Losing a tooth is considered an undesirable dream, because it often portends the death of one of the dreamer’s loved ones or his exposure to some disease. Here we explain to you what it means to see a tooth falling out in a dream: A tooth in a dream indicates physical strength and good health. But if someone sees his teeth falling out in a dream, this is not considered a good omen. Rather, it indicates a health death or the viewer being exposed to a major health crisis. Perhaps A falling age indicates that the fortuneteller is entering into serious and not good crises. It is worth noting that the tooth comes out in the patient’s dream, and as a result he feels sadness and pain. It was evidence of the approaching period of guardianship and imminent death. It may be a sign of the grief felt by the divine for the loss of life. Of Among the signs of a tooth or molar falling out in a dream for a seeker of knowledge: failure and failure in the educational process. This vision can indicate human weakness in the face of crises and obstacles. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a dead person asking for a bath in detail. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of a new molar for a married man. A molar or tooth is considered What is new in a dream is a praiseworthy vision. This vision is good in the life of the dreamer. The interpretation of a dream about the appearance of a new tooth for a married man indicates: A married man is entering a new stage in his life. Perhaps this is...

title: More than fifty new interpretations of seeing fasting in a dream

preview.html: The dream of fasting in a dream is one of the dreams that many people wonder about, because of the excitement that this dream carries. Get to know the interpretations suggested by this dream. Seeing a person breaking his fast while he forgot does not mean seeing him breaking his fast intentionally, and likewise it differs from the viewer. In its precise interpretation, let us learn about the appropriate interpretations of the dream of fasting in a dream through our Egyptian website. Interpretation of the dream of fasting in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he is fasting during Ramadan, it means that he has made a vow that he must fulfill. If he is found unable to fast Ramadan, this indicates his financial inability. And his inability to fulfill this vow. But if a man finds in his dream that he is breaking his fast during the day in Ramadan, then this is explained by one of two things: Whoever dreams that he is breaking his fast in Ramadan, and that he broke his fast without intention, then he breaks his fast while he forgot, this indicates that this person is trying He earned his money legally and he takes care of his Lord Almighty. He does not accept that his wealth includes the impurity of forbidden things, and this, if he indicates this, indicates that this man is watching God Almighty in all his words and actions. It is also evidence that this person’s life will be blessed with lasting happiness and his future will be bright. Because he is the one who watches God secretly and openly. May God grant him success for what is good. But if he sees in a dream that he is breaking his fast during the day in Ramadan, and this breaking his fast was intentional, then this indicates that this person is performing actions that do not please God and His Messenger. Rather, these actions may go beyond, including eating forbidden things, and doing what is not acceptable to God and His Messenger. It is permissible by law or custom. But if she sees in her dream that she is fasting other than Ramadan. This indicates the close relationship that this woman has with the Lord of the Worlds, and if this woman watches God in all her affairs, she is not satisfied with that, but rather hastens to insist on what will bring her closer to her Lord. Also, consideration of the subject is evidence of his complete adherence to duty, because he who watches the subjects and preserves She must adhere to the duty more. The interpretation of fasting the month of Ramadan in reality indicates physical health, prevention of diseases and epidemics, and giving the right to God Almighty’s wealth. If a person sees a fasting person in his dream, this indicates that God Almighty has blessed him with health and well-being, and that this man fulfills his right. God is in his money, because he pays the alms and zakat that God has imposed on money, and gives it to those who deserve it. But if a woman sees in her dream that she fasted one day in Ramadan and broke her fast one day, this indicates that this woman is trying to fast, but she is unable to fast. It may be a lack of ability. On fasting because this woman is old and cannot fast due to her poor health condition. This may be because this woman did not fast when she was young, but her first fast was when she grew up. You suffer from the inability to continue fasting. Interpretation of fasting in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing a person fasting in a dream and said: Seeing a fasting person in a dream has 10 signs of hallucinations: intention, health, leadership in the cause, victory, rank, increase in blessings. Repentance from sins and disobedience, Hajj to the House, maintenance for the child, and dignity. And he said: Whoever thinks that he broke his fast during his fast and forgets is transgressing.

title: The most important interpretations of seeing intercourse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Touching in a dream is one of the dreams that carry a different set of connotations that differ from one dreamer to another, knowing that most interpreters referred to non-reassuring connotations, and today through the Asrar Dream Interpretation website, we will discuss with you the interpretation in detail for men. And women according to different social situations. Touch in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about touching symbolizes that the dreamer is exposed to envy and hatred and is dominated by feelings of jealousy and cannot even hide them in front of others. If a woman sees that she is possessed by jinn, this is an indication that someone close to her at this moment is trying to harm her in any way. Of the forms. Whoever dreams of jinn entering his body is evidence that the dreamer is immersed in worldly pleasures and desires, knowing that in this way he commits many disobediences and sins far from the path of God. The great commentators Ibn Shaheen narrated that the satanic touch in the dream indicates that the dreamer He has been trying for a while to achieve something, but he faces a lot of obstacles and obstacles in his way, so in the end he is. He will not be able to achieve any of his goals and ambitions. Seeing satanic touch in a dream is evidence that the person who has the vision is a treacherous and cunning person who causes harm to everyone around him. Touch in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing touch in a dream while reading the Qur’an indicates the presence of An enemy of the dreamer who is striving in the current period to harm him, but he is in the care of God Almighty as long as he remains. As he is close to him. As for the one who dreams that he is haunted by demons and does not want to be cured, this is a sign that he is preoccupied with the pleasures of the world, and committing many sins and disobedience, so he prefers to stay away from the path. Running. Take it before it is too late because the presence of a major lack of money and livelihood will affect the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin also showed that the touch in the dream is a sign that the dreamer thinks a lot about the affairs of the jinn, and that the satanic touch of this dream is only a reflection of what is happening in the dreamer’s head. Touch in an individual’s dream. The demonic touch in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence that she has actually been touched in reality, so she must protect herself by reading the Holy Qur’an and memories and not be harmed. Among the interpretations mentioned by Ibn Sirin is that seeing demonic possession in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her exposure. To hatred and envy, and her closeness to God Almighty guarantees her freedom from any evil or wickedness. Her life. Touching jeans in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her connection to someone who deceives her and manipulates her feelings, so she must be as careful as possible so as not to be exploited because of his loss. Touching jeans in a single woman’s dream indicates that there are people close to her in her life who are trying to mislead her into falling into More problems because they just want to hinder her life. Touching a dream for a married woman: Seeing yourself touching jeans in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will be deceived by someone close to her and entering her house. Touching a married woman in a dream is an indication that her relationship with her husband is currently unstable and trapped. By Ashekh
